info.name: GTK Native for Firefox (disable Australis)
info.description: Makes Firefox conform to the system theme for the tab bar, tool bars, and most icons, removing Australis look. Inspired by the GTK+ Native extension which is no longer maintained.
info.additionalInfo:
Tested with Clearlooks and Numix themes on linux, may cause glitches with other setups.
Now compatible with lightweight themes (personas).
